description: it is fun and dificult to win but also needs to modernize some items including the tanks.

I have played this game for many years but it is only available with Fedora or other systems that are not based on the Debian deb (apt) installer. This games is fun and a good way to spend time when there is nothing else you need to do.
El juego es buen y entretenido pero me dió motion-sickness.
